concept.title: What is Addition?
concept.shortdesc: To explain what it is that you are doing when you use the JPS addition feature.

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of adding numbers, you should know what addition is. "Addition" is a mathematical concept in which you combine two numbers to find the sum, or total, between two numbers.
So, the purpose of addition is to create a larger number. We take one number and combine it with another.
The add (+) symbol represents addition of numbers.
This same symbol is used in the app to represent addition; therefore, it will complete the task of adding numbers.
